reviews.review: This game is ass in both concepts. Survivors are constantly nerfed and are absolutely horrible when playing solo. Killers are fucking god awful because they can't counter SWFs. There's no balancing in this game that makes any sense and the fact that they care more about skins than they do their gameplay is genuinely sad. The game should've never been created with competitiveness in mind. It's a god-awful game and I can't wait for the uninstall to finish.
I really love this game. Even though I'm not the best killer player, I really enjoy playing with killers and with survivors.
If you hate yourself and want to hate yourself more this is the game. An unhealthy relationship between you and a video game await here.

Boring, clunky and just simply not fun. Many other games out there that far exceed this. Playing this feels almost like eating a full packet of crackers all at once, Dry and totally uninspiring.

Played this like 5 years later.... still trash.
Game is alright I don't have a girlfriend, family, friends but at least I can bust to the huntress
very fun is scary and is cool

This game just isn't what I remember. It has become so ridiculously pay to win and the new killers are so overpowered I'm compelled to (and often do) just leave the game and accept the matchmaking penalty because it is simply impossible and not fun to play against them.

I like this game. It's fun and can be challenging at times, but I don't mind a challenge. However, I do not like the "TOXIC" players as they may call it on here, but I just ignore them at the end game because its a game and its suppose to be fun.

Games only fun when you dont run into killers running meta perks and being assholes. Sadly for one fun killers theres 5 shitters with fgt perks and playing killers no one has fun playing against. Games fun though overall just dickheads make it a bad exp.
It's a fun 4 Survivors VS 1 Killer kind of game. Definitely some gore/violence to it, but still fun if you like this kind of game.

J'ai 450 heures, rank 2 surv et rank 5 killer..... 
TOUS mes personnages ont été reset lvl 1 (autrement dit, mes 450 heures de farm n'ont servis à rien).

J'adore le jeu, mais je vais juste le désinstaller parce qu'il me chie dessus.
i like playing the game. it's honestly not as scary as you think, only time is when a micheal turns up out of nowhere and gives you a bit of a scare. :)

This Game is very poggers. if you love horror movies and a jump scare every once and a while then this game is up your ally. Always fun to que up with friends and torment the killer. Or just que as a killer and slaughter the poor survivors.
As a lot os bugs like A LOT but its still very fun game to play with friends or alone
Great Game to play solo or with friends!

Over hyped shit with a toxic community and a Developer who Doesn't know how to make games. My disappointment was immeasurable  when i found out Behavior interactive was originally Artificial Mind and Movement, and they developed a monsters inc ps1 game that i love. All this game does is Capatalize on over liked movies from the 80s because of a bunch of jerk of millenials who idolize the shit they liked as kids like the brainless scum they are. I pray to every deity i don't get doxxed for hating this shit game.

Solo-Q is a nightmare and constantly pairs me up with useless teammates. As a killer, I get memed on by survivors who are way better than me. The game's matchmacking was bad before, but now it's worse with MMR, and the game is buggy as hell. Whoever spends more than 2 hours on this game clearly has no life.

10/10, would recommend
10/10 would simp for the killers again

Game used to be fun, they changed their netcode so that its now impossible to swing through pallets, and suddenly every game is just walking form pallet to pallet, and surivors are incentivized to play in the most boring and uninteractive way possible and insta drop every pallet. Uninstall

Too many bugs for as old as the game is, and the design of the game allows for killers to troll and drag out a match if they can down players. Leaving players stuck doing nothing for an extended period of time but getting punished if they leave

Game is really fun by itself, but the players can be extremely toxic...

Ich persönlich kann meine Meinung aktuell lediglich aus der Sicht der "Killer" und nicht der "Survivor" wiedergeben, da ich diese aktuell noch nicht gespielt habe.
Ich finde es gut an dem Spiel, dass die verschiedenen Killer verschiedene Spielstile aufweisen und jeder seine eigenen Stärken hat. Seien es hinterhältige Fallen, diverse Fernangriffe mit direkten Schaden oder indirekten einbußen für die Surviver. 
Jeder Charakter hat auch eine interessante Hintergrundgeschichte, die wahrscheinlich den meisten die Horror Filme etc. kennen bekannt sein könnten, für jene aber, die ansonsten nichts mit diesen Genre zutun haben wie meine Wenigkeit diese näher bringen. 
Ich finde es bisschen schade, dass man für viele Killer diverse Erweiterungen kaufen muss (meines Wissens stand nach, bin nicht so regelmäßig im Game, um es in Erfahrung gebracht zu haben, ob man diese eventuell auch durch Eventereignisse bekommen kann/konnte), die sich  aktuell für mich als Gelegenheitsspieler nicht lohnen.
Das season System ist meiner Meinung nach gut gelungen, jedesmal wenn ich gespielt habe gegen Ende einer Season hatte ich auch mal Erfolg in den Spiel, da die meisten regelmäßigen Spieler dann dementsprechend nicht mehr in den Unteren Stufen waren.

Alles in allem kann ich sagen, dass mir das Spiel gut gefällt. 
Zu den Survivor part werde ich nichts sagen, mangels eigener Spielerfahrung. Doch wer sich davon ein Bild machen will, es gibt derzeit viele Streamer, die DbD oft zocken und zeigen, dass es viel spaß machen kann einen Survivor zu spielen.

I thought in my wildest dreams I'd never play this game cause it was too scary...

Now YES, this game is scary, but I grew completely use to it! It's fun with friends, but solo is also a harder challenge.

Killer is fantastic, but the gen rushing does really suck sometimes when you just wanna farm Blood points.

Overall I'd give this a 8/10, truly I love this game, it has many downfalls and very upsetting moments, but
jugar a la mancha con navajas 10/10

continuously buggy but that's honestly a part of the charm.  i love this game and the team does a really good job of working with the community to improve.  interestingly, i find the community a lot less toxic in general than most competitive games! but you'll definitely still see plenty of toxic people unfortunately.  really love the game and i hope to keep playing more!
